title: Bike Skills 101: Ride Adults
desc: Ready to make the leap? Build your skills and confidence for four weeks under the guidance of our trained instructors.

title: Bike Skills 102: Practice
desc: Casual rides on protected bike paths that give novice adult and mature teen cyclists the opportunity to practice riding.

title: Bike Skills 201: Handling Skills
desc: A 3-hour on-bike class for adults and mature teens who have recently learned how to ride or who want to improve their core cycling.

title: Bike Skills 202: Bike Path Ride
desc: A 2-hour practice session for adults & mature teens who know how to ride but want to build confidence in their bike control skills -

title: Street Skills 301: Rules
desc: A 2-hour on-bike class for adults and mature teens who are ready to learn how to ride a bike.

title: Street Skills 302: Street Riding
desc: An interactive presentation & discussion that provides concrete examples of city cycling.

title: Virtual Classroom: Care
desc: Three-hour weekend programs for adults and mature teens who want adults and mature..

title: Bike Commuting
desc: A 90-minute presentation chock-full of information to help you navigate the bike-buying process.

desc: A free evening presentation and discussion for parents/guardians.

title: Fix-A-Flat
desc: Learn how to fix the most common bike repair problem, a flat tire.

title: Bike Touring 101
desc: Learn how you can take your cycling life on the great open road .

title: New York Bike Law
desc: Learn the law you need to know when you ride in New York!
